job_description:
Position: Senior Sales Executive

About the role:

The Senior Sales Executive plays a leadership role in driving sales success by understanding customer needs, staying informed about the market, and effectively presenting products or services. Their cross-functional collaboration and strategic approach contribute significantly to the overall success of the sales team.

If you are looking for a challenge, want to make an impact on our sales success, and looking for high-growth potential for yourself, this role was made for YOU!

Do you have what it takes?

We pride ourselves in being flexible, but there are some things we feel very strongly about. We are careful to select people for our team that have demonstrated excellence through their skills, character, and background. It takes talent and drive to meet the challenges of our rapidly evolving environment – and that’s all the fun! Are you looking for new ways to raise the bar and don’t blink at challenges? Do you want a fulfilling career that takes advantage of your talents? If so, then it’s time to join DecoArt. Now is the time to be a part of something big!

What you will be doing:
• Drive sales and profitability with new customers and markets.
• Primary liaison between assigned customer territory and the company.
• Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with customers to build trust and loyalty.
• Identify opportunities to introduce additional products or services to meet the evolving needs of the customer base, contributing to increased sales.
• Engaging in discussions with customers to reach mutually beneficial agreements and finalizing sales transactions.
• Address and resolve customer issues or concerns in a timely, effective manner.
• Conducting research to understand market trends and collecting data on customer preferences, allowing the company to tailor its products or services accordingly.
• Providing feedback from customer interactions to the product development team for continuous improvement.
• Development and implementation of special promotions designed to boost sales.
• Monitoring and maintaining adequate inventory levels with key customers and ensuring that the displayed products meet quality standards.

What you need:
• Bachelor’s degree in marketing, promotions, advertising, sales, business administration or other financial fields
• A minimum of 5 years of professional experience in Sales
• Experience in the Arts and Crafts Industry preferred but not essential
• Demonstrated ability to effectively sell ideas and concepts both internally and externally
• Track record of successfully prospecting and developing new customers while also maintaining and growing existing customers
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Good listening skills and attention to detail
• Ability to build strong relationships with customers and navigate challenges while maintaining positive connections
• Great Sense of Self-Motivation, Ambition, and Determination
• Ability to work well within a team but also achieve desired results Individually
• Excellent presentation and negotiation skills
• Ability to prioritize tasks effectively

What we offer:
• Competitive base salary
• Comprehensive benefit package including quality health insurance, vision, dental, disability and life insurance
• Traditional 401k plan and company match
• Paid time off including paid holidays
• A chance to learn with and from interesting and enthusiastic colleagues
• Collaborative workplace, which will challenge you and celebrate your work

Where you'll be: 220 Lexington Green, Suite 400, Lexington, KY 40503
• This position does offer the opportunity to work remotely.

What we’d like from you:
• A resume that illustrates why you are the right person for this role

Come and Be Inspired!

For 35 years DecoArt has inspired creativity. In our consumers we inspire the creativity to craft, decorate, and make. In our employees we inspire the creativity to innovate, problem solve, and get things done.

DecoArt is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer and committed to creating an inclusive employee experience for all. We welcome all qualified job seekers regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, genetic information, disability, or protected veteran status.

If you have a disability and believe you need a reasonable accommodation to apply for this position, email HR@decoart.com with your request. This email address is not for general employment inquiries or correspondence. We will only respond to those requests that are related to the accessibility of the online application system due to a disability.
